answerText: Frederick Douglass [or Frederick Augustus Washington Bailey][10] This book details the life of Linda Brent, who is repeatedly assaulted by Dr. Flint and has a consensual affair with Mr. Sands from which she bears two children. The protagonist famously spends seven years in a crawl space.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 10 | 16 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This man starts to gain literacy from Sophia Auld and is later sent to work for Master Hugh. [10] Name this man who detailed his time under the negro-breaker Mr. Covey in his autobiography and also published the North Star abolitionist newspaper for a time.
